# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes

(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/

/fonts/
ignore$

\.avi$
\.eot$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.svg$
\.ttf$
\.wav$
\.woff$
\.woff2$

^\.github/
